alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 06 at 6:52PM CDT until July 06 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... West Central Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Southwestern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North Central Gregg County in northeastern Texas... Harrison County in northeastern Texas... Southern Marion County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Panola County in northeastern Texas... Northeastern Rusk County in northeastern Texas... East Central Upshur County in northeastern Texas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 652 PM CDT, The public reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Shreveport, Longview, Bossier City, Marshall, Hallsville, Haughton, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Jefferson, Benton, Stonewall, Ore City, Oil City, Doyline, Mooringsport, Elysian Fields, Karnack, Deberry and Woodlawn. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Gregg; Harrison; Marion; Panola; Rusk; Upshur
